positive: The Yoga devices have problems with the hinges, but the displays are pretty nice (not Vivobook OLED nice though).
They have good colour space coverage and look pretty good non gamery while the Pro also has half decent graphics.
Pricey but seems like a really good deal.
negative: No problem with buying used btw.
I have no complaints about this laptop except for one: Dell put over 100 GB of stuff on the SSD (Solid State Drive).
I have done some limited research but am still unsure on which rig to get.
